data.title: Enhabit Home Health & Hospice
data.meta_description: Enhabit Home Health & Hospice is a leading provider of home health and hospice services. We’re committed to delivering high-quality, compassionate care for every patient. Learn more today.
data.text:
The future of home health and hospice is here

For over 25 years, Enhabit has provided high-quality, compassionate care. And we’re building on that commitment to expand what’s possible for patient care in the home.

Home health and hospice glossary

Our comprehensive glossary of words, phrases and terminology can help take the confusion out of your home health and hospice journey.

Explore

Extraordinary care on your terms

We’re raising the bar for what it means to provide A Better Way to Care®, offering each patient the health care journey they deserve — wherever they call home.

Our services

Home health

Comprehensive care that helps patients meet their specific goals.

Our services include:

Skilled nursing

Physical therapy

Occupational therapy

Speech therapy

Medical social work

Home health aides

Learn more

Hospice care

Bringing dignity and comfort home through compassionate end-of-life care.

Coverage includes:

Interdisciplinary care team

Pain relief and symptom management

Medications related to terminal illness

Medical, nursing and social services

Durable medical equipment (DME)

Aide and homemaker services

Spiritual care for patients and loved ones

Learn more

Expanding what’s possible in home health and hospice

As one of the nation’s largest home health and hospice providers, our team of compassionate clinicians and innovative partners delivers the highest-quality care to every patient. Combined with predictive analytics and clinical expertise, we help patients achieve the outcomes they want.

Our approach

Supporting your needs at every step

Do you know the difference between home health and home care? More important, do you know how to choose which is right for you? Read our article to learn more.

Learn more east

Leaders in home health and hospice

Our team of skilled home health and hospice clinicians is committed to delivering a better way to care for our patients and their loved ones. Through advanced technology, enhanced clinical collaboration and superior patient-focused care, we’re helping patients achieve their specific goals — at home, where it matters most.

Read more

Patient

Caregiver

Employee

Leadership

Home health patient

Home health patient

“Enhabit has been with me from the moment I stepped out of the hospital. I’m breathing better and moving better, all thanks to their care. They see you on a personal level. I know I’m not just a number to them.”

Loved one of a hospice patient

Loved one of a hospice patient

“From the very beginning, we felt like Enhabit really cared and was committed to helping us. All of our questions were answered promptly, and we never felt like a burden. We knew we had the right hospice team to take care of our mom, and we cherished that she was able to spend that time at home, surrounded by loved ones.”

Kristen L.

Case Manager, RN

“As a nurse, I take great pride that each day I have the opportunity to make a difference in someone’s life, even if it is as small as making them smile.”

Barb Jacobsmeyer

President and CEO

“Enhabit has been a critical part of the home-based care equation by providing the finest quality care available.”

The best of what’s next in home-based care

We employ a vast team of skilled clinicians, each focused on developing meaningful relationships with patients and their loved ones. It’s our dedication to compassionate care and support, combined with predictive technology and evidence-based practices, that helps us exceed industry standards and ensure every patient gets the care they deserve.

Our innovations

Patients cared for*
